item.title: From SQL Queries to Data Modeling
item.description: This past week I had the opportunity to attend Microsoft TechEd 2012. Lots and lots of great material presented â€“ I’m pretty stoked about some of the amazing features of SQL Server 2012’s BI stack. During the course of the week I discovered something that has been emerging in my thought process for a while, but sort of hit the level of practicality as I saw one particular feature demonstrated: the BI Semantic Model.
